casebody.data:
ROBERT GOELET et al., Plaintiffs and Respondents, v. PAUL N. SPOFFORD et al., Defendants and Appellants.

Before Freedman and Curtis, JJ.

Decided Nov. 2, 1872. Appeal from judgment entered upon report of a referee in favor of plaintiffs in an action for rent due upon a lease. Dexter A. Hawkins, for appellants. Charles Jones, for respondents. Judgment affirmed.

Opinion by Freedman, J., concurred in by Curtis, J.
